name: The Labyrinth
text: This card is unaffected by other cardâ€™s effects. This card cannot be activated while you have cards in the Extra Deck. If this card is activated, Special Summon 3 "Wall Shadow" from your  hand or Deck, ignoring summoning conditions. Both players can only attack with 1 monster per turn. During the End Phase, take 1000 damage unless you control "Labyrinth Wall". You take no battle damage from battles involving "Wall Shadow". If you control "Labyrinth Wall", your opponent must target it for attacks.
